prompt:
You are a professional content strategist. Your task is to create a logical structure for a blog post.

Task: Create a section structure for a blog post with the following details:
Title: Test Post
Main Idea: Test idea
Facts to Include: Fact 1, Fact 2

Return ONLY valid JSON. Do not include any explanation, commentary, formatting, code blocks, or HTML. Output must begin with { and end with }. The output must be a JSON object with a single key "sections" containing an array of section objects. Each section object must have exactly these fields: "name" (string), "description" (string). Example output: { "sections": [ ... ] }
